ppmtouil(1)                                         ppmtouil(1)





NAME
       ppmtouil - replaced by pamtouil

DESCRIPTION
       This  program  is  part of Netpbm(1).  In May 2002, ppm-
       touil was extended and renamed to pamtouil(1).




netpbm documentation        May 2002                ppmtouil(1)
